ISSUE.TITLE: Issue with carts that don't require shipping but "tax based on" setting is set to "shipping address"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Step to reproduce: 1. Set "tax based on" setting is set to "shipping address" 2. Add some shippable products to the cart and place an order. "ShippingAddress" property of a customer will be set and stored 3. Now add some not shippable products to the cart and start checkout. Tax will be based on a previously entered shipping address. But in this case we should use "Default address" entered on the tax settings page It could reproduced only with one-page checkout. We should fix it by adding the following code to CheckoutController ``` //no shipping address selected _workContext.CurrentCustomer.ShippingAddress = null; _customerService.UpdateCustomer(_workContext.CurrentCustomer); ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1249 Fixed an issue with carts that don't require shipping but "tax based on" setting is set to "shipping address". We should clear "shipping address" when shipping is not required.
